DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Participation Patient Declined Reason Other Specify Short Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Abbreviated or short text field to describe a response of 'Other' for the reason an eligible patient declined participation in a trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Participation Patient Declined Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care._Taking part in an activity._No Value Exists_An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.:Taking part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
The act of taking part in an activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Abbreviated or short text field to describe a response of 'Other, Specify'.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.

ReferenceDocuments.name: If the patient was eligible b
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient was eligible but the patient declined participation and there was "Other" selected as the patient-related reason why, indicate the reason
